wikipedia_page.main: Fred Turnbull (born 28 August 1946) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender for Aston Villa from 1966 to 1974. He had a twin brother who loved football also and an older sister.

response: * Fred Turnbull (footballer, born 1946), English footballer for Aston Villa
* Fred Turnbull (footballer, born 1888) (1888–1959), English footballer for Coventry City and Southampton
* Fred Turnbull (Australian footballer) (1884–1947), Australian rules footballer
